trends: There have been no other sightings in Garland
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were heading home from thanksgiving dinner with family when I noticed a bright orange light at our 12:00. I pulled my car over to use my phone to video record the light, we watched it for about 1 minute until it faded out. I am not positive that it was moving when we first saw it, but it was stationary the entire time I recorded it. I do not know how to upload the video off my phone, but I will figure it out and submit it as aoon as possible.
